title: Riot support ignoring??
body: I messaged the support telling them people keep treating me poorly during games asking them why they're not getting punished for it. A person from the support checked my message, marked it as "solved" without responding to me and banned me from messaging them back, are you kidding me??

replies.body: Marking as solved just means a response was sent back, you can still continue replying until it's been marked as **Closed**.  You should still be able hit up your specialist with any concerns or questions!  Toss me your ticket number as well, I'd like to see what happened for you!

Nope, it says solved yet I can't add anything to it anymore. Please help me out, I've had an awful week with the support trying to figure things out...
The ticket number: #31843259

Sorry the week has been so rough.  :(  I was able to look at your ticket, and you're right it looks like it's been closed as a result of concerns being addressed.  

As this is a public boards I don't want to get too into this (and I'm not part of that team), but your request is not something we offer as a result of the circumstances.  :/

You can always hit us up in another ticket for advice and topics like that, but our stance is super firm in this situation.  We're not trying to make things hard on you, but any player in this kind of situation would be met by the same stance.  Sorry friend.  :(
I'm sorry to hear that, this is really unfair to me...
